body: If I were staircasing on a map, and I reach height limit. Not knowing that I have reached height limit, I continue building, so I'm block glitching. Do I jump off because I block glitched? Or am I allowed to jump back?
body_tagged: If I were staircasing on a map, and I reach height limit. Not knowing that I have reached height limit, I continue building, so I'm block glitching. Do I jump off because I block glitched? Or am I allowed to jump back?
title: Just a question

replies.body: im pretty sure youre allowed to jump back
replies.body_tagged: im pretty sure youre allowed to jump back

replies.body:
I always jump back
But Kyoal called me out for block glitching
Wanna confirm
I don't want an infraction :(
replies.body_tagged:
I always jump back
But Kyoal called me out for block glitching
Wanna confirm
I don't want an infraction :(

reply_to.body: im pretty sure youre allowed to jump back
reply_to.body_tagged: im pretty sure youre allowed to jump back

replies.body: Related question: Is placing water past the height limit allowed? Liquids aren't affected by regions.
replies.body_tagged: Related question: Is placing water past the height limit allowed? Liquids aren't affected by regions.

replies.body:
@Dafrozenblaze Technically it is block glitching, but it's not something i personally would punish for nor expect you to jump off. I'd be fine with you just jumping back. That might depend on each mod tho.

@Wulfacaspice I'll ask and get back to you.

replies.body: I have a way to solve this, mapdevs contact me on skype
replies.body_tagged: I have a way to solve this, mapdevs contact me on skype

replies.body: Because you had no intention of abusing a glitch and didn't continue abusing it when you found it, you shouldn't get punished for it.
replies.body_tagged: Because you had no intention of abusing a glitch and didn't continue abusing it when you found it, you shouldn't get punished for it.

reply_to.body: lol once compendium did like the walls except TDM in RNDZV 3.5. And i almost made it to the top of the wall by using the water trick. Then he took the wall away spawned a couple withers and turned into an ender dragon to knock me of my water like 220 blocks up. I then proceeded to spam kys then was soon banned for suicide encouragement for 2 weeks. But yah know its almost over so no point in repealing. I was able to get a map done in 4 days because of that. And you know...
